tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    interactions_count INT
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), address VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_date TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id));

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    points INT
);

CREATE TABLE interaction_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_time TIME,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE promotions (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_name VARCHAR(50),
    promotion_details TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_promotions (
    customer_id INT,
    promotion_id INT,
    redeemed BOOLEAN,
    redemption_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, promotion_id)
);
